Hero.headline: Hi, I'm Mary Carmen
Hero.description: With over 10 years of experience helping families find the right insurance coverage, I specialize in making complex insurance decisions simple. Whether you need Medicare, ACA, Life Insurance, or Annuities, I'm here to guide you every step of the way.
Hero.imageAlt: Mary Carmen Chamorro - Professional Insurance Agent

Services.title: How I Can Help You
Services.subtitle: Specialized insurance solutions tailored to your needs

Video.title: Meet Mary Carmen
Video.subtitle: Watch my introduction and learn how I can help you

Testimonials.title: What My Clients Say
Testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from families I've helped

cards.quote: Mary Carmen made Medicare so easy to understand! She took time to explain all my options in Spanish and helped me find the perfect plan. I'm so grateful for her patience and expertise.
cards.name: Rosa Martinez

cards.quote: I was overwhelmed with life insurance options until I met Mary Carmen. She listened to my family's needs and found us coverage that actually fits our budget. Highly recommend!
cards.name: Carlos Hernandez

cards.quote: Professional, knowledgeable, and truly cares about her clients. Mary Carmen helped both my parents get on Medicare Advantage plans and saved them hundreds per month. She's the best!
cards.name: Jennifer Lopez

Contact.title: Ready to Get Started?
Contact.subtitle: Let's find the perfect insurance solution for you and your family

cta.title: Schedule a free consultation today!
cta.bottomText: Ready to protect what matters most? Let's talk today.

branding.description: Licensed insurance agent specializing in Medicare, ACA, Life Insurance, and Financial Planning for the Hispanic community.

helpNow.title: Need Help Now?
helpNow.description: Message me on WhatsApp for immediate assistance during business hours.

Footer.copyright: © {year} Tú Seguro con Mary. All rights reserved.
Footer.disclaimer: We do not offer every plan available in your area. Any information we provide is limited to those plans we do offer in your area. Please contact Medicare.gov or 1-800-MEDICARE to get information on all of your options.
